title: Gujarat: How doctors saved a lion from going blind
description: A team of doctors performed cataract surgery on a lion in Gujarat state to save his vision.

title: What a San Francisco vote says about the US left
description: The recall of San Francisco's top public prosecutor amid rising drug deaths exposes a rift on the left.

title: Child stroke survivor determined to recover say Lowestoft parents
description: Five-year-old Tilli, from Suffolk, is one of 400 children to have a stroke in the UK every year.

title: Samantha Cristoforetti: The astronaut taking TikTok to new heights
description: Samantha Cristoforetti has developed a huge following through her TikToks from on board the ISS.

title: Hopwood DePree: From Hollywood to restoring Downton Shabby
description: Film producer Hopwood DePree swapped LA for Rochdale to save his family's ancient ancestral home.

title: Sherwood - the Nottinghamshire strike that divided a town
description: A BBC One crime drama examines how murder ignites the deep divides in a former mining community.

title: Memory boxes help families remember lost voices
description: A PhD student has been creating audio memory boxes for hospice patients in Northern Ireland.

title: Aukus: Australia to pay €555m settlement to French firm
description: The €555m settlement draws a line under a row that threatened to torpedo EU-Australia trade talks.

title: England v New Zealand: Watch highlights of Daryl Mitchell's century
description: New Zealand batter Daryl Mitchell brings up his second century of the series off 184 balls against England on day two of the second Test at Trent Bridge.

title: Stuart Broad: England cricketer's pub gutted by fire
description: The village pub part-owned by Stuart Broad is badly damaged, leaving the cricketer "devastated".

title: Rwanda asylum plan: Campaigners' challenge to be heard on Monday
description: They are taking the case to the Court of Appeal after a judge ruled the first flight could go ahead.

title: East Midlands Airport closes runway in new drone alert
description: Eight flights are diverted from East Midlands Airport as it closes its runway for more than an hour.

title: Shah Subhani: Murder charges over Hounslow man found in woodland
description: Shah Subhani was reported missing in May 2019, six months later his remains were found in woodland.

title: Minister sorry for 'godawful' Birmingham and Blackpool comment
description: Cabinet Office minister Heather Wheeler had been speaking at a conference in London.

title: China warns Taiwan independence would trigger war
description: China's defence chief tells the US that Beijing will fight against any Taiwan independence bid.

title: Ayelsbury theatre paintings capture effect of Covid-19
description: An artist’s commissions throughout the pandemic capture an"industry on its knees" but also "hope".

description: We chat to Florence 'DJ Cuppy' Otedola, daughter of billionaire Femi Otedola, about life at Oxford University.

title: Fuel costs: The drivers living with the UK's highest prices
description: People living in parts of the Highlands are used to paying more for petrol and diesel.

title: Climbers scale 'biggest adventure' in UK climbing
description: It is only the third time the Long Hope Direct at St John's Head in Hoy has been climbed.

title: World Cup 2022: Wales' qualification revives Yma O Hyd success
description: "People talk about goose bumps and hairs standing up on their necks," says singer Dafydd Iwan.

title: Salt and sugar tax for England to be ruled out
description: The proposal is not expected to be adopted when government unveils its food strategy for England.

description: The activist's family are hoping Anthony Albanese will step in as a deportation deadline looms.

title: Ukraine's prosecutors wrestle with a new role: war crimes investigators
description: An unprecedented real-time war crimes investigation is testing Ukraine's local prosecutors.

title: Capitol riot hearing: Trump dismisses daughter Ivanka's testimony
description: Mr Trump says his daughter "had long since checked out" after she distanced herself from his claims.

title: Dom Phillips: Possible human remains found in hunt for journalist
description: UK journalist Dom Phillips and indigenous expert Bruno Pereira went missing last weekend.

title: Medical gaming treating life-changing injuries
description: From strokes and Parkinson's to PTSD, severe conditions can be helped with game-based therapies.

title: Would you walk to another shop to save 5p on a bag of oranges?
description: Single mum Safina has taken an extreme approach to saving money since her events business collapsed.
